thread.title: Warning for pet owners as cat food products are recalled
thread.title_full: Warning for pet owners as cat food products are recalled | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Warning for pet owners as cat food products are recalled
text:
Credit: Ann Parry Zuma Press/PA Images Pets at Home is recalling four lines of its AVA dry cat food products because there are lower levels of thiamine (Vitamin B1) present than specified in the recipe.
The company is advising cat owners not to feed the affected product batches to their pets.
Details of the affected batches can be found on the Food Standards Agency 's website.
Last updated Mon 27 Feb 2017 Animals
